20101206201937.000|20101206201939.500|CCO|ALL CONSISTENT WITH CLAYBURN OR
20101206201939.500|20101206201942.000|CCO|ROMER.

20101206202000.000|20101206202002.000|CCO|OF THINGS.
20101206202002.000|20101206202005.333|CCO|DO YOU BELIEVE THAT THE IDEA OF
20101206202005.333|20101206202008.667|CCO|DISTINGUISHING MARRIAGE FROM
20101206202008.667|20101206202012.000|CCO|DOMESTIC PARTNERSHIPS IN NAME
20101206202012.000|20101206202014.500|CCO|ONLY IN ORDER TO PROMOTED AS A
20101206202014.500|20101206202017.000|CCO|VEHICLE FOR PROCREATION,

20101206202137.000|20101206202139.500|CCO|MR. COOPER SAID JUST A FEW

20101206202142.000|20101206202143.667|CCO|INSTITUTION.

20101206202844.000|20101206202846.000|CCO|THEY HAVE ENJOYED THE RIGHT,

20101206202852.000|20101206202854.500|CCO|-- ALL THAT IS TAKEN AWAY IS THE
20101206202854.500|20101206202857.000|CCO|HON. DESIGNATION.
20101206202857.000|20101206202859.500|CCO|ARE WE FREE TO GO BEYOND A
20101206202859.500|20101206202902.000|CCO|HOLDING, IF WE WERE TO RULE IN

20101206202904.500|20101206202907.000|CCO|RIGHT TO USE THE LABEL "A
20101206202907.000|20101206202909.500|CCO|MARRIAGE" AND TO RECEIVE THE
20101206202909.500|20101206202912.000|CCO|CERTIFICATE THAT UNDER THOSE
20101206202912.000|20101206202917.000|CCO|CIRCUMSTANCES IT IS A VIOLATION?
20101206202917.000|20101206202922.000|CCO|CAN WEAN GO FURTHER THAN THAT?

20101206203754.500|20101206203757.000|CCO|COURT DOES NOT HAVE TO INFER,

20101206203802.000|20101206203803.429|CCO|DEMONSTRATES THAT THE PURPOSE OF

20101206203804.857|20101206203806.286|CCO|PROPONENTS AVOIDED IT

20101206203813.667|20101206203815.333|CCO|CONSTITUTION TO INCORPORATE THE
20101206203815.333|20101206203817.000|CCO|MEASURE AFTER THE CALIFORNIA

20101206203820.333|20101206203822.000|CCO|WHY?
